commitMessage:

@@@LUCENE-5703: BinaryDocValues producers don't allocate or copy bytes on each access anymore

@@@LUCENE-7407: speed up iterating norms a bit by having default codec implement the iterator directly
@@@LUCENE-7479: SimpleText should directly implement the new doc values APIs.
@@@LUCENE-7529: Fix argument checks of MultiDocValues' advanceExact impls.
@@@LUCENE-5309: Optimize facet counting for single-valued SSDV / StringValueFacetCounts (#255)
